DataElement.preferredName: COVID-19 Positive Laboratory Test Result Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not there was a COVID-19 positive test result.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus.
